input: The moon is cold and unforgiving
output:
and: CC  
is: VBZ  
cold: JJ  
unforgiving: JJ  

The word "and" is tagged as a coordinating conjunction (CC).  
The word "is" is tagged as a verb, 3rd person singular present (VBZ).  
"Cold" is an adjective (JJ) and so is "unforgiving".
